summary.overview_comment: The resume aligns moderately well with the job description, showcasing relevant technical skills but lacking some specifics.
improvements: Highlight experience with scalable web services

measurable_results: Developed CRUD functionalities for user table
content.description: This section ensures your resume includes clearly quantifiable results and is free of grammatical or spelling errors. These improvements make your resume more impressive and memorable to recruiters.

tips: Showcase examples of innovative problem solving
skills.description: This section compares your resume against the job description to identify missing or underrepresented skills. Adding these skills increases the chance of passing ATS filters.

tips: Organize content into bullet points for clarity
format.description: This section checks date formats, resume length, and the effective use of bullet points to ensure your resume is clean, concise, and ATS-friendly.

tips: Add a professional summary to align with the job role
sections.description: This section checks whether all required fields — such as contact information and work experience — are properly filled and formatted, ensuring ATS compatibility.

style.description: This section helps adjust the tone and wording of your resume to align with the job description while avoiding generic or cliché phrases, resulting in a more professional and impactful resume.

items: Include experience with scalable web services and APIs
Mention familiarity with Agile and DevOps practices
Provide quantifiable achievements to demonstrate impact
recommendations.title: Recommendations for You
recommendations.description: Here are some personalized recommendations to help you improve your resume and increase your ATS score, as well as suggestions to guide your skill or career development.

overall_comment: The resume shows potential but needs improvement in highlighting relevant experience with scalable web services and Agile practices.
